status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary:
Over the 6‑hour window the turbine stayed in **Normal Operation** throughout (37 ten‑minute intervals) with generally **steady production**: low average power (mean 0.1545) and moderate variability (power std 0.0794), consistent with modest winds (wind speed mean 5.42 m/s, std 1.10). Wind conditions were mostly stable but included an **isolated high wind-speed outlier** (max 21.3 m/s) relative to the mean.

Operational indicators were largely stable (rotor RPM std 0.68, generator RPM std 76.55) with **average pitch near -1.2** and a **non-zero mean yaw misalignment** (~9.78). The **power residual was consistently negative on average** (mean -0.0842), indicating production tended to run below the reference expectation during this period, while temperatures were steady around **46.35**.
